.. _`Cnetplot`:

CNETPLOT
========

Draw a bar plot from enriched terms





Example
-------

This meta-wrapper can be used in the following way:

.. code-block:: python

    rule test_enrich_cnetplot:
        input:
            rds = "enriched.RDS"
        output:
            png = "cnetplot.png"
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-240-gd9cffe8c/bio/clusterProfiler/cnetplot"


    rule test_enrich_cnetplot_with_fc:
        input:
            rds = "enriched.RDS",
            gene_list = "geneList.RDS"
        output:
            png = "cnetplot_fc.png"
        wrapper:
            "0.66.0-240-gd9cffe8c/bio/clusterProfiler/cnetplot"


Note that input, output and log file paths can be chosen freely.
When running with

.. code-block:: bash

    snakemake --use-conda

the software dependencies will be automatically deployed into an isolated environment before execution.



Notes
-----

Use clusterProfiler enrichXXX to get enriched terms. This may also be used
with gseXXX, but you might want to consider GSEA-like plots.

Parameters:
  * cnetplot_extra: Extra parameters for cnetplot, besides "x",
  and "foldChange"




Authors
-------


* Thibault Dayris



Code
----
